dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: I think I can lump this package with that one, and... let's see where this one's gotta go... W-why is the sorting process so complicated this time?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg:
I haven't been sleeping well, with the recent surge of late-night delivery contracts...
I'll try to get some sleep in now.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
Boxed lunches usually end up freezing solid when we're making deliveries through the cold.
That's why some Fixers keep their lunches in the Courier Trunks they've been assigned, but... that's a violation of the Devyat' Association rules...

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg:
It's dangerous to travel at night, but... I don't have a choice.
There's a package that needs to be delivered before the Night in the Backstreets.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
It's important for Fixers of the Devyat' Association to keep themselves up-to-date about cultures of each District.
Speed is one thing, but we also have to be careful not to accidentally break a Taboo of a Wing or a Syndicate's rule.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Why don't I just drive there, you ask? Um... I'm pretty sure going on foot and following Poludnitsa's shortcut directions would get me there much faster than driving would.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
I can survive most risky situations by having Poludnitsa disengage the output threshold.
But that'll deduct way too much money from my payout... If it doesn't kill me in the process.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: [Possible delivery delay detected: Syndicate altercation 200m ahead. Rerouting.] Lots of route adjustments today, huh... Left turn, then? [New route discovered; navigating courier.] You want me to... scale the building?!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Only lower-rung Syndicate henchmen who don't know about these dimensional bags are dumb enough to attack us. Courier Trunks are locked by Protection Mode anyway, so...
Oh, what about members of the Fingers? They're... we usually meet them as our clients.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Poludnitsa, I'm bored. Can you play me a song? [Poludnitsa does not support the requested functionality.] Huh? But Miss Rodya said— [Correction. This AI model does not support the requested functionality.]

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Ugh, I really hoped it wouldn't have to come to this, but I need to get there in time...! Poludnitsa, engage mode conversion! [Hammer mode engaged. Swing to the undulation of decay particles.]

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Is it a new delivery order?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: My next destination is...

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Uh... did you call me? Oh, did you order something through the Devyat'?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I still have time...

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Can you clear the way, please...?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Nngh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: ... I said move!

dataList.desc: Death #1
dataList.dlg: Poludnitsa... help... [Pathfinding failed. Courier absence detected. Poludnitsa, engaging Protection Mode.]

dataList.desc: Death #2
dataList.dlg: N-no! Please, please give me another chance! I've never been late bef— [Update. Delivery failed. The courier will be collected shortly. Thank you for your service. Poludnitsa, engaging Protection Mode.]

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: ... I'm not running an errand like this for you again.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: I-I'm busy, okay?

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: AAAHHHHH! Your package has been delivered! I'm not late, am I? I'm on time for the delivery, right?

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: This package will be delivered earlier than expected. The client will be happy to hear that.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Pant... pant... I-I'm almost there, Poludnitsa! I just need five more minutes, please...!
